item.title: Bins not being collected, 25th July
item.description:
This spot is for weekly collection in bin bags only. Bins were out on time, and recycling and food waste were collected. However, rubbish has not been, and now animals have been into the bags and causes littering. This has been reported before

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Middleton Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Overhanging bush, 25th July
item.description:
Bush needs to be trimmed so it is not overhanging the pavement Difficulty getting wheelchair through without being scratched by the bush Picture shows Google maps street view from 3 months Plant is not maintained - regular occurrence. Please rectify as the space is narrow

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Eden Park, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Kitchen cupboards and a mattress and a sideboard, 25th July
item.description:

item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bickley Crescent, Bickley, London

item.title: New River water alongside path blocked, 24th July
item.description:
The New River water alongside East reservoir at Woodbury Downs is part blocked.Larger waterbirds can't access the stretch of water and it's particularly dangerous for young chicks still being born. With no maintenance, vegetation and rubbish have built up.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Woodberry Down Estate, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: A large branch has fallen from a willow tree, 24th July
item.description:
A large branch fell off a big willow tree in Priory Gardens Orpington today, near the main pond and near the benches. We had just finished feeding the ducks nearby and they had gone back in the pond when the branch fell, it could have hit a duck or a passer by feeding the ducks, branch looked rotten. I lifted it off the path and put it by the fence.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Court Road, Poverest, London
Report on FixMyStreet
